data.name: Fix Me Fix You Soundtrack and Director's Commentary
data.detailed_description:
Relive the beautiful and inspirational story behind “Fix Me Fix You” with this fantastic DLC. Enjoy the enchanting, magical and nostalgic music that was used to accompany this game. Also included is the trailer song “Find the Way”.

This DLC also includes a fantastic behind-the-scenes look at everything with the Director’s Commentary by Antonio Lorenzo Carino, the Director, Head Writer and Composer behind this Visual Novel.

Tracks Included

01 - Find the Way (Feat. Audrey Carmel)
02 - Austin's Theme.mp3
03 - Diner Theme.mp3
04 - An Uncomfortable Conversation.mp3
05 - The Proposition.mp3
06 - New Beginnings.mp3
07 - Therapy Room.mp3
08 - Fix This.mp3
09 - Friends & Memories.mp3
10 - Rivers Estate.mp3
11 - A Tender Moment.mp3
12 - Midnight.mp3
data.about_the_game:
Relive the beautiful and inspirational story behind “Fix Me Fix You” with this fantastic DLC. Enjoy the enchanting, magical and nostalgic music that was used to accompany this game. Also included is the trailer song “Find the Way”.

This DLC also includes a fantastic behind-the-scenes look at everything with the Director’s Commentary by Antonio Lorenzo Carino, the Director, Head Writer and Composer behind this Visual Novel.

data.short_description: The “Fix You Fix Me ” Official Soundtrack features music composed and produced by Antonio Lorenzo Carino. Relive this touching story through the charming melodies that served as the soundtrack of this visual novel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 / 8/ 8.1/ 10
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8 / 10.9 / 10.10 / 10.11 / 10.12
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 / 10.7 / 10.8 / 10.9 / 10.10 / 10.11 / 10.12
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
